text: Καὶ τὸ Πνεῦμα καὶ ἡ νύμφη λέγουσιν, ‹Ἔρχου.›Instead of ερχου twice, TR has ελθε twice. Only 3 MSS—Gregory 296, 2049, 2075—have ελθε, all three being XVI century and under suspicion of having copied Erasmus’ printed edition. No one knows where Erasmus got ελθε, but certainly it wasn’t from John.
